articles.title: Migrants survive sat on rudder as ship arrives in Canary Islands - Euronews
articles.description: Historically, the islands have been a popular gateway for African migrants attempting to reach Europe. #EuropeNews
articles.content:
Three African migrants travelled on a ship's rudder to reach Spain's Canary Islands, say authorities.

articles.title: Europe's first Mars rover Rosalind Franklin now set to launch in 2028 - SiliconRepublic.com
articles.description: Months after the ESA severed ties with Roscosmos, member states have invested €360m to ensure the Rosalind Franklin rover lands on Mars.
articles.content:
Months after the ESA severed ties with Roscosmos, putting the fate of the mission up in the air, a 360m investment will help ensure the rover lands on Mars.

articles.title: Police bust cocaine 'super-cartel' in Dubai, Europe - News24
articles.description: Police have dismantled a huge drugs "super-cartel" that controlled a third of Europe's cocaine trade, arresting 49 people in various countries including six top suspects in Dubai, Europol said.
articles.content:
• A super-cartel that controlled a third of Europe's cocaine trade has been dismantled and 49 people in various countries have been arrested.
